nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -34,10 +34,22 @@
 	@ConfigItem(
 		keyName = "time",
 		name = "Display Options",
-		description = "Configures what text the report button shows."

+		position = 1
 	)
 	default TimeStyle time()
 	{
 		return TimeStyle.LOGIN_TIME;
 	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "switchFormat",
+		name = "24 hour time format",
+		description = "Configures time to the 24 hour time format",
+		position = 2
